meanings.definition: Not belonging to or characteristic of a particular nation.
meanings.sent1: The nonnational students in our class come from various countries.
meanings.sent2: She felt out of place in the nonnational cultural event.
meanings.sent3: The nonnational flag made everyone chuckle at the international party.
meanings.sent4: His nonnational accent was like a melody from a distant land.
meanings.sent5: The nonnational cuisine filled the room with exotic aromas.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a citizen or national of a particular country.
meanings.sent1: The company hired several nonnationals to work on the project.
meanings.sent2: The nonnational had to go through a different immigration process.
meanings.sent3: The nonnational at the party shared interesting stories about their homeland.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nonnational in a sea of familiar faces.
meanings.sent5: The nonnational brought a fresh perspective to the team.
